text: All the Best, Isaac Hayes is a studio album by the American singer and songwriter Mark Kozelek, released on April 24, 2020 on Caldo Verde Records. Recorded between October and November 2019, it is Kozelek's thirty-first studio album. The album features spoken word, stream of consciousness compositions with piano accompaniment throughout. Its lyrical content focuses on Kozelek's experiences during a 2019 North American tour and its aftermath. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2020 albums Category:Mark Kozelek albums Category:Spoken word albums by American artists
title: All the Best, Isaac Hayes
